pages.text: The $(mob)Dhampir$() is a monster that spawns on the surface of Taiga biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. $(mob)Dhampir$() attack players on sight with melee attacks that apply a $(thing)Slowness$() effect. While below 25% health in combat, she receivea a $(thing)Speed$() and $(thing)Haste$() effect. Upon death, a $(mob)Dhampir$() may spawn a $(l:grimoireofgaia_vampire)$(mob)Vampire$() in its place.
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Book Bag$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open the bag and receive a random enchantment book.
